meanings.definition: A colored wax stick used for drawing or coloring.
meanings.sent1: I used crayons to color a picture of a tree.
meanings.sent2: She bought a box of crayons for her art project.
meanings.sent3: The crayons danced across the paper, creating a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: His imagination was a box of colorful crayons, ready to paint the world.
meanings.sent5: The smell of crayons always reminds me of my childhood.

meanings.sent1: The crayon drawing of a sun was bright and cheerful.
meanings.sent2: He framed the crayon artwork and hung it on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The crayons whispered secrets to each other on the paper.
meanings.sent4: Her crayon masterpiece was a burst of creativity on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The child's crayon drawing captured the essence of summer.
